Gary Gensler's Contentious Reign Over Crypto Approaches Its Twilight https://www.coindesk.com/news-analysis/2024/10/22/gary-genslers-contentious-reign-over-crypto-approaches-its-twilight/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines 4XLMYR4FJZG3PBHNQF6E3A67QE Jesse HamiltonSomeday soon, somebody besides Gary Gensler will be calling the shots at the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, and most of the crypto industry will rejoice.More than any other figure in the U.S. government, this SEC chair played an unflinching antagonist to its aims. That no-holds-barred opposition is likely to cease, one way or another, in the coming year, when the securities agency gets a new boss.
